profile:
Valentini Kitchens has been building and renovating Quality Kitchens and Cabinetry since 1974 to the Toronto and surrounding GTA markets. 
Valentini Kitchens is a true "Family Business" that has been owned and operated by the Pasquariello Family for over 45 years. 
Valentini was founded in 1974 by the late Mike Pasquariello and is now run by his 3 sons, Tony, Piero and Marco. 
We at Valentini Kitchens have maintained a high quality standard and reputation from our first day in business, with our attention to detail and service to our customer as our # 1 motive.
 
Today, we have made changes to our business to compete with our changing markets and with our changes we will maintain our quality and service to make sure our clients are 100% satisfied. We have also implemented a few more cost effective lines of Cabinetry, many that are locally sourced and a few off shore lines to meet the changing markets and cost budgets of our clientele.
 
Valentini Kitchens offers Cabinetry in many options to fit your needs and budget:
- Full custom made line of Kitchen, Bath and various types of Cabinetry and Mill Work.
- Semi custom made locally sourced and branded line of Kitchen, Bath, Laundry & Closet Cabinetry.
- Semi custom made off shore sourced and branded line of Kitchen and Bath Cabinetry.

  
Full line of custom made Residential Cabinetry Options including: 
- Kitchens and Bath Cabinetry
- TV, Entertainment and Wall Unit Cabinetry
- Bar and Built In Cabinetry
- Laundry & Mud Room Cabinetry
- Home Office Cabinetry
- Closet Organizers and Home Storage Solutions



Full line of custom made Commercial / Industrial Cabinetry Options including:
- Office Kitchen & Bath Cabinetry 
- Custom Cabinetry for Restaurants, Bars, Coffee Houses, Hair Salon / Spas, Dental and Doctor Offices, etc.

 
When you purchase a service from Valentini, you are buying into a family that has a reputation of giving our customers 100% of Quality, Service and most importantly Price.
Being one of a handful of the GTA'S Cabinetry Pioneers, Valentini is small in size but is evolving with the everyday changes in the world of Woodworking and Full Home Renovations.
Valentini offers a true complete "1 Stop" shopping experience by providing customers with full Renovation capabilities. We can start with an in home or in showroom consultation and the rest is up to the customer. Valentini can take care of full project management from start to completion. We offer a full range of Renovations to complete selection of Retail Products.
What makes us at Valentini Kitchens Unique is that we are one of the only companies that allows consumers to purchase everything directly from us for use on their Home Renovations, meaning "We Install Everything We Sell". By supplying the retail products we sell, we can insure you as the home owner full warranties of the products we use on the job and also "Less Time" having to run around to have all the products ready on the job site. We take care of showing you the products in our own Kitchens and Bath Showroom and the delivery of everything to your home when it is needed for the Renovation.

 
Valentini also offers a full list of Retail Showroom Products including: 
- Premade Bath Vanity Cabinetry
- Tile, Stone and Mosaics
- Hardwood, Vinyl, Laminate and Carpet Flooring
- Quartz, Granite, Marble and Laminate Counter Tops
- Plumbing Fixtures
 



As many companies grow in size, we at Valentini Kitchens want to remain small in size with our 1 Factory Showroom Location, we pride ourselves in maintaining our high standards of Quality, Service and Reputation that has made is one of the leaders in the Kitchen and Renovation Industry for over 4 decades. As a family business, we offer the ultimate hands on approach with any project we take on.

Valentini offers a 1 hour "In home" or "In Showroom" free Estimate Consultation (By Appointment only).
Please Call or Email us with your inquiries today. (Please leave a voice mail message or email us if we are not able to respond the same day as we may be on the job site, We will definitely respond back to everyone that contacts us as soon as possible ). 

Valentini Kitchens and the Pasquariello Family had its own hot reality TV series called "Building Family" in 2005 on HGTV Canada. This series aired weekly nationwide with a total of 6 half hour episodes. Please click here on the Homestars Valentini Kitchens Video Galleries to watch the episodes and to read up more on this, please visit our website. 
 
We hope all of our past and future customers enjoy watching this show as it shows the everyday life of our family business working together in the real world of Kitchen Manufacturing and Home Renovations with a flare of true reality in our day to day activities.
